position: Incoming Consultant at Deloitte | Data Science | Analytics | IIT KGP

experience.title: Prompt Engineer
experience.description: Leveraged email categorization techniques through prompt engineering in order to establish a fully automated and streamlined sales process• Integrated Gmail API in Python, optimizing the email access to primarily classify the emails into Product Order, Inquiry and Irrelevant• Further classified the Inquiry emails into query and quotation categories; generated SQL command to extract data for query type mail• Utilized GPT-3.5 API, both for the classification of mails as well as for PDF-based information extraction for some of the categories• Achieved an accuracy of around 95% in the classification (Primary and Secondary) and an accuracy of 88% for the PDF-info retrivel task
experience.description_html: Leveraged email categorization techniques through prompt engineering in order to establish a fully automated and streamlined sales process• Integrated Gmail API in Python, optimizing the email access to primarily classify the emails into Product Order, Inquiry and Irrelevant• Further classified the Inquiry emails into query and quotation categories; generated SQL command to extract data for query type mail• Utilized GPT-3.5 API, both for the classification of mails as well as for PDF-based information extraction for some of the categories• Achieved an accuracy of around 95% in the classification (Primary and Secondary) and an accuracy of 88% for the PDF-info retrivel task

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Developed a robust text classification model utilizing advanced NLP techniques to categorize articles accurately into violent and non-violent• Extracted and labeled 25,000 articles from a pool of 5 million+ articles using the GPT API, ensuring a high-quality dataset for training• Employed data balancing for uniform class representation and fine-tuned BERT and DistilBERT models on the prepared test dataset• Achieved a remarkable 93% accuracy in classification of articles with the DistilBERT approach, signifying its efficacy for the task at hand
experience.description_html: Developed a robust text classification model utilizing advanced NLP techniques to categorize articles accurately into violent and non-violent• Extracted and labeled 25,000 articles from a pool of 5 million+ articles using the GPT API, ensuring a high-quality dataset for training• Employed data balancing for uniform class representation and fine-tuned BERT and DistilBERT models on the prepared test dataset• Achieved a remarkable 93% accuracy in classification of articles with the DistilBERT approach, signifying its efficacy for the task at hand

experience.title: Computer Vision Intern
experience.description: Analysed patents comprehensively by employing various techniques to optimize images, assess complexity, quantify structural characteristics• Compressed 2.5 million images using jpeg lossless compression, without compromising the quality of images and calculated size ratios• Deployed keras_ocr to preprocess the images and to find the complexity, calculated the number of edges with the help of hough lines• Identified the solid lines with the help of contours and measured the ratio of solid to dotted line to detect the weightage of solid part
experience.description_html: Analysed patents comprehensively by employing various techniques to optimize images, assess complexity, quantify structural characteristics• Compressed 2.5 million images using jpeg lossless compression, without compromising the quality of images and calculated size ratios• Deployed keras_ocr to preprocess the images and to find the complexity, calculated the number of edges with the help of hough lines• Identified the solid lines with the help of contours and measured the ratio of solid to dotted line to detect the weightage of solid part
